title: imac late 2013 820-3588
message: Image is distorted after of while, mouse does not work,I tried with another ram memory, with a good operating system, also with only logic board, fan and screen and the same problem happens, with external video too

title: imac late 2013 820-3588
message:
Then should be an iGPU issue.
Test it with Windows Live, that will load a generic video driver.
